document_data.name: Feith Lightsong
document_data.mainbody: '''Feith Lightsong''' was a [[human]] inhabitant of [[Eveningstar]] during the mid-1480s [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: Feith had reddish-brown hair tied into two braids, and wore a brown and white dress with black leggings.
